the REWE store brand sales value in 2020.

Why work for Allianz?

In addition to the risks posed by the Covid-19 pandemic, as
of December 31, 2020 DB Group's main risks (likely risks)
were in the areas of law and contracts, and regulation.

As a result, the total number of purchased products may be
lower than the total of the breakdowns by country.

On April 25, 2020, Mr. Torsten Westphal resigned his mandate
as Deputy Chairman of the Supervisory Board with immediate
effect and his mandate on the Super visory Board of DB AG
with effect from May 31, 2020.

This does not apply to the amount of compensation that the
member of the Supervisory Board transfers to a third party
on a pro rata basis as a result of an obligation entered
into before their appointment to the Supervisory Board.

We also expect all ALDI employees and business partners to
act responsi- 1

To meet rising demand for high-performance and safe UV
filters, BASF is investing in a new production line at the
Kaohsiung site in Taiwan and plans to double its global
Uvinul ® A Plus production capacity by mid-2022.

They specify that the classification of liabilities as
current depends on the company's rights as of the balance
sheet date to postpone settlement of the liability by a
minimum of 12 months after the end of the reporting period.

We aim for 100 per cent of the own brands at ALDI Netherland-
s to be labelled accordingly by 2022, thus fulfilling an
applicable industry obligation.

We have developed a new underwriting strategy to address
cyber exposures and we are now in the process of ensuring
relevant policies are updated and clarified in regard to
cyber risks.

It became apparent that the industry will not meet its
obligations under the Detox Commitment in 2020.

A key tool is the Allianz Risk Capital Model which assesses
natural catastrophe events for the upcoming year on
subsidiary and Group level.

Whether at our stores, in our warehouses or from home, all
ALDI employees went the extra mile in this extraordinary
stressful situation.

12 Cyber risks • COVID-19 has further increased the impact
of cyber incidents and attacks as more activities move
online (see section 03.1.4

We are continuously working to reduce the amount of
packaging used and to meet the rising demand for more
sustainable product packaging.

It can also send its measurements remotely to our analytics
platform, which crunches the data to yield insights that we
can provide to our customers: a breakdown of their
consumption into active and stand-by, alerts about anomalies
in their usage, and graphics showing how their energy
consumption is evolving.

We also address the In the future, we plan to develop
concepts for pilot projects that improve access to grievance
mechanisms in relevant supply chains, taking into account
the 'United Nations Guiding Principles on Business and Human
Rights' (UNGP).

Our approach is to reduce wastewater volumes and contaminant
loads at the source in our production processes, and to
reuse wastewater and material flows internally as far as
possible.

The current Chairperson of the Supervisory Board of Allianz
SE is Michael Diekmann, the former CEO of Allianz, who took
this position after observing the legally required two-year
'cooling off' period.

At the same time, we encourage and promote a leadership
culture that empowers our employees to respond to customer
needs quickly and efficiently with a solution orientation.

As a food supplier, we have borne particular responsibility
during the crisis.

For instance, we established a new and dedicated function
for sustainability from 01 January 2021.

The mission statement provides around 79,000 ALDI employees
with a clear sense of direction.

These measures allow us to take into account not only the
legal requirements, but also the growing customer expectatio-
ns for more sustainable packaging.

In some countries, such as the Netherlands, similar national
labelling systems are used.
International Buying ALDI Einkauf SE & Co.

We require our suppliers to comply with the 'amfori BSCI'
(Business Social Compliance Initiative).

We have established dedicated ESG Task Forces to integrate
sustainability matters across the core processes of Allianz
SE.

We have already achieved success in using soluble,
biodegradable materials for encapsulation in other areas;
for example, in the shells of our pre-dosed liquid detergent
capsules and dishwasher detergent tabs, which consist of
soluble polyvinyl alcohol foil.

The coronavirus pandemic impressively demonstrated last year
that decisive action, rather than a wait-andsee approach, is
needed in times of crisis.
Goal achieved.

Vendor and inhouse applications can provide a comprehensive
picture of risk accumulation in any defined location.

The individual financial statements of the consolidated
companies are prepared as of the balance sheet date of the
Consolidated Financial Statements.

This includes used oil, oil filters, vehicle batteries and
fluorescent tubes which containing mercury.

Our exclusion approach covers multiple aspects with
exclusion lists updated annually based on data from external
service providers and inhouse research:

These include the International Chemical Environmental (ICE)
initiative and the German Transport Accident Information and
Emergency Response System (TUIS), in which BASF plays a
coordinating role.
3 Including incineration for energy recovery.

Other sectors at risk include automotive, chemicals, pulp
and paper, retail and machinery/manufacturing.

To enhance the quality and reliability of our reporting,
PricewaterhouseCoopers GmbH Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft
(PwC) has conducted limited assurance reviews of our
sustainability reports, processes and data since the 2016
reporting year.
Project ongoing.

Examples include comprehensive programs to increase
efficiency, which include implementing new management
practices.

These describe responsibilities, requirements and assessment
methods.

methods.

evaluation method, see https://corporate.evonik.de/en/respon-
sibility/environment/climate-change-climate-protection/co2eq-
-avoided-by-using-evonik-products the first digital lab
assistant, which Evonik has developed specifically for the
coatings industry.
Employee satisfaction increased significantly.
